name: Protected Health Information
description: Health information that identifies an individual or for which there is a reasonable basis to believe can be used to identify an individual

name: Electronic Protected Health Information
description: PHI that is stored, transmitted, or maintained in electronic form

name: Medical Records
description: Patient clinical information, diagnoses, treatments, medical history

name: Billing Information
description: Invoice, payment, insurance claim, financial information

name: Mental Health Records
description: Psychiatric treatment, counseling, behavioral health information

name: Substance Abuse Treatment
description: Substance abuse diagnosis and treatment information

name: Verbal Communication
description: Spoken PHI in conversations, phone calls

name: Imaging/Visual
description: Imaging, photographs, visual media containing PHI

name: Name
description: Patient full name, first name, last name

name: Medical Record Number
description: Unique identifier assigned to patient medical records

name: Address
description: Patient street address, city, state, zip

name: Creation
description: PHI is initially created or generated

name: Storage
description: PHI is stored in systems and repositories

name: Transmission
description: PHI is transmitted or shared between entities

name: Destruction
description: PHI is securely destroyed or de-identified

name: Public Health Activities
description: Disease surveillance, health monitoring, public health reporting

name: Organ/Tissue Donation
description: Facilitation of organ or tissue donation
